snippet: The iPhone is the best-selling smartphone in the world, and there are likely to be lots of questions about the newest model, and about Apple's other announcements. Leave us questions in the comments and our reporters will try to answer some of them...
abstract: The iPhone is the best-selling smartphone in the world, and there are likely to be lots of questions about the newest model, and about Apple's other announcements. Leave us questions in the comments and our reporters will try to answer some of them in this post.

headline.main: Ask Us Your Questions About Apple's Announcements
